resources.string: You may send an email to the developers of this app to ask questions or provide feedback / suggestions. Thank you for your input!
This app was created by Teoh Yu Xin, a Year 4 student at NUS High School. If you have any feedback, do feel free to drop an email via the feedback tab!
ReadyAchieve is a goal setting app customized by you, for you. Easy and clean overview of all the goals to achieve by chronological order allows you to track and sort your goals efficiently.
The use of milestones allows you to group your small goals together to achieve one big end aim by taking small manageable steps.
Discovering default templates allow you to start off somewhere and develop your milestones and goals.
Seeing yourself compete against other users via the leaderboard and earning of badges keeps you motivated and driven to complete all your goals!
Undraw.co, material.io. coolors.co, freepik, icons8 illustrations and icons used in the app, as well as tips and advice provided by https://www.thebalancesmb.com/goal-setting-tips-2948134
Milestones can be added under goals! Add a milestone under goal group and view the milestones via the goal tab!

If you have obtained a badge, good job! \n\nThis means that you have obtained a certain number of points, and worked doubly hard to obtain it!
You obtain the "Getting Started" badge when you earned 20 points, "Warming up" when you have earned 100 points, "Hang of it" when you have earned 250 points and "Achieving it" when you have earned 500 points!

Points are obtained when you complete a milestone or goal, and different types will earn you different points! \n\nCompleting standalone milestones earn you 25 points, completing milestones in goals earn you 20 points and completing goals earn you 100 points!
Dashboard shows standalone milestones and goals details. Click on the checkbox to complete your milestones and goals. To view milestones in goals, click the goals tab!
The right circle shows the number of milestones completed out of all of your milestones in your goal, click your goals to view more!
